attributes.action: Review Evidence and the Reqierment to being charged or arrested for common Assult
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Prime Minster I ask that the Home Office Reviwe the law in Common Assult. Yes i agree that Common Assult is a Assult of many factors but this is being used by Partners who no longer wish to be in relationships as no Independent Evidence is needed where a person can get 3-4 friends familey to make statements to police and to the court. What we are asking is that Common Assult should be arrested if phical injurey is caused or independent whitness outside the familey CCTV or even evidence from a medical exspert..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
